website_summaries.verdict: Affordability, quality, and extras put this guitar at the top of our list in terms of value.
pros: Nice looking and suitable for beginners
A good value, as it comes with useful accessories and an instructional DVD to get you started
cons: Some guitars came with defective bridges
Quality control concerns include damaged guitars and missing accessories

customer_reviews.title: Value & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for beginners, received everything in the bundle. Sound quality is great for the price, but keep in mind that, with guitars, you get what you pay for. Don’t expect amazing sound quality out of a sub-$1000 acoustic. Playability is decent, and as a beginner, you want something a bit tougher to play to really build dexterity. Definitely recommend this guitar for anyone learning, or starting to play again after a long hiatus.
customer_reviews.author: Jared D.

customer_reviews.title: Over a week of shipping and all promised parts not included.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this guitar on last Thursday on 2 day guaranteed shipping. Today Thursday, it arrives and the box is damaged pretty well. Opened up guitar, unharmed and in flawless condition. Looking around for the tuner that’s supposed to come with is, no where to be found. So I downloaded the fender tube app. Guitar plays well and sounds nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watts

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.text: Fender is a USA Company. But the Guitar is Manufactured in China. Would take a refund if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Taiyo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Guitar neck was stained. Looked as though it was used by someone who "sweated" on the fret bar at the top left (where one would hold the neck for most playing). The guitar was not tuned. I expected more for a Fender product. Returned to Amazon. Bought another model and am expecting it in 2 days. I hope it will not be a repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It plays lovely.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 13 yr old grandson’s birthday. The first one came busted up. Thankfully my husband opened it to tune it for him b4 his party. We had time to return it and get a replacement. It’s a beautiful guitar. Has a really nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: No scratches! Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but i got 2 gig bags, one is really thin, the other is a thicker padded type. Got 2 packs of picks instead of one. Got 2 sets of strings instead of one. Got 2 straps , one cheaper looking. But i love it, no scratches, came fast and in great condition. Thanking the Lord for the extras which I don’t remember as part of the bundle. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: redwagon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money , love it
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it! It came with 2 guitar bags idk why but it did which is cool, also came with strap and stuff! I love how it says Fender by the tuning key area instead of saying Squire.
customer_reviews.author: Deezy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Start Out Guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our 16 year old son as an early Christmas gift and was not disappointed! It came with everything we needed to start, and he was reading tab and playing songs by night time. Well made and came with new strings that won't tear your fingers up. Tuning doesn't come undone either, which was nice. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.K

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for the price. Excellent starter.
customer_reviews.text: These are great guitars for the price the only reason I didn't go five Stars is because I didn't like the way the gig bag was put on top of the guitar in the Box. It was putting pressure on the bridge if anything was stacked on this box it could have damaged it. I inspected it and it doesn't appear to have any damage but they should figure out a better packing method.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Bridge broke after 6 months light use
customer_reviews.text: The bridge started coming off after 6 months of light use. Would cost more to fix than the guitar is worth. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allie C

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar At A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guitar for my daughter as a birthday present and she loves it! She is a beginner, and I searched the internet for the best guitar for beginners, and the dreadnought design was deemed best. She's been practicing on a smaller ukulele that she got for Christmas and is now ready to upgrade to full size. The guitar is of great quality and Austin Bazaar offers the best price around. The sound is fantastic and the Sunburst design is beautiful. All the other items in the bundle gives her everything she needs to be on her way. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the Natural Bundle with Gig Bag, Tuner, Strap, Strings, Picks, and Austin Bazaar Instructional DVD
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an amazing guitar
customer_reviews.text: I think this may be my first review ever, after using Amazon for sooo many years. This guitar was THAT amazing, that I’m taking the time to express my gratitude with it and hoping that anyone on the edge of buying this one or not, decides to go with their gut and BUY THIS GUITAR! You will not regret it- I know I haven’t. Amazing quality, amazing price, and it just feels really good to hold and play. Feels like a really expensive guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico P.

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product for someone who is just starting to learn the guitar! it comes with everything you need and with some good lessons you'll be playing in no time. a guitar stand would be nice buts easy enough to add on. BUT if you aren't like me who is paranoid that its going to fall while i'm not looking so i leave it on my couch instead, then no need to worry about a stand.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: the Quality is great and price is right. My son is a beginner and he already knows how To tune it. Great services!!!!
customer_reviews.author: eval13

customer_reviews.title: Great looking guitar, even came early!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of this guitar. For $200 I can now learn to play, especially with the 3 months of free lessons that were included!! I'm excited to get started. It even came a couple days early!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Just a good guitar. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is very good considering I have 12 and 4 Fenders. Excellent buy. Great price. Played it for a couple weeks. If its what you want... I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: COVID REVIEW 2020: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar been playing it for a couple of weeks! The box was outer box containing the inner box holding the guitar was slightly damaged but ig that’s what box’s are for am I right! The guitar itself came in perfect condition the only thing missing were the extra strings it came with but I emailed Austin Bazzar and they sent be the strings. HIGHLY recommend for beginners like my self I’ve never played an instrument b4 and I am certainly enjoying the guitar!
customer_reviews.author: a dude who bought something during COVID-19

customer_reviews.title: A great place to start guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, great sound, and great accessories! Bought this guitar as a gift, and have had the genuine pleasure of listening to it being used.
customer_reviews.author: Vandemonde

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a solid guitar that provided me with the basics to get up and running. This was what I found and from what I can tell so far it hasn't disappointed. The sound is rich, the strings are light, which is easier for beginners, and the price was right!. I got the sunburst, which looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ro

customer_reviews.title: Missing gear!
customer_reviews.text: I like the guitar and its been a great addition to the family but I never received the case. I reached out to the vendor and never heard anything back...too bad. Otherwise the rating would have been 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A thing of beauty! Great value for the product and what is included!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and seller communication was excellent. I have never played guitar and am excited for the three months of free lessons that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: CindyP

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Played years ago. Wanted to try again. Came with everything needed. Arrived with scratches. Still looks great. Seller provided partial refund. Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: glacier7

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money, and its a Fender
customer_reviews.text: Great starter guitar, but really its just a great guitar and you get lots of extra goodies and free fender guitar lessons. Its tough, sounds beautiful, little country, little rock, very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle at a great price! I’m stuck at home during the coronavirus pandemic and figured now is as good a time as any to learn the guitar!
customer_reviews.author: TSA

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st guitar for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive guitar for a beginner. But, completely worth the money as a 1st guitar. Aesthetically too, the guitar looks stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Makhija

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar and great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Brings a lot of extras: A tuner, free 3 months membership to a learning app, replacements strings, 2 bags. Perfectly packaged and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My instructor told me this was a good guitar to begin with with. Plus Fender added 3 months of free lessons that helps me.
customer_reviews.author: D Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I wanted. The guitar was tuned correctly after checking with the tuner that was included. I have also started the Fender lessons online (3 months included) and so far have been amazed at how easy it is to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Parent004

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AND EVERYTHING CAME AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after reading some of the reviews that mentioned everything didn't come as advertised. Mine did! I'm new to the guitar, so I can't really speak about how good the quality is just yet, but so far I am pleased with what I have. It seems like a great starter kit for people like me who know nothing about guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice guitar for low price
customer_reviews.text: Missing picks, other than that I'm pleased. Has all other accessories, good finish, sounds great. The body is a little thick if you're a small person , I don't like the gig bag, nice tuner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you got fat fingers you may want a guitar with a wider neck.
customer_reviews.text: There are better choices out there, yet this one for such a low cost will give them a run for their best comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner and this guitar is beautiful and exactly what I expected. Arrived in perfect condition and even received it sooner than expected. :)
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guitar for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who has been wanting to learn to play the guitar for some time now. It's a great guitar for beginners. The kit came with everything you would need to get started. Once he got it tuned, the sound was fantastic. My daughter has even picked it up and started doing the online lessons.
customer_reviews.author: GotLabradors

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for great price
customer_reviews.text: It came with 2 soft cases, 6 picks, extra strings, Fender play app gift card, electronic tuner. Started taking myself to play, it sounds great and is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but needs more quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking.. major factory setting problem. String spacing is way off. Sounds bad. Looks as if the neck is bent. Returned for Yamaha. I will have to see if Yamaha is any better.
customer_reviews.author: Ginseng

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar. My stepson loves it. And the sound is great. All the accessories included are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Despairblade

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for beginners. The free trial of Fender play is super handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meowna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner package, and it’s beautiful! The 3 months of Fender play that’s included is extremely helpful as well. (Guitar stand In picture was bought separately)
customer_reviews.author: Amberli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with this set! It seems to be of high quality, too!
customer_reviews.author: Julia James

customer_reviews.title: Great start!
customer_reviews.text: Me a complete beginner I definitely like this guitar. Sounds very good to my beginner ear & looks great for an affordable price. Have had this for two months and so far the only complaint is the glossy body that is a fingerprint sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy V Nabatov

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar and bundle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is learning guitar in 9th grade. He loves Christian rock and metal, he has always wanted to learn how to play the guitar and this guitar is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit and decent sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kit for someone looking to see if they like guitar. Don't spend $300+ on something that you are not sure you are going to like. And you will be happy with the sound quality as you get better. Then, get that $300+ guitar :)
customer_reviews.author: Colby A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Better than what we expected. This guitar came with everything my son needs to begin playing. I would recommend to anyone who is considering buying this. Great quality, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Guitar, looks amazing sounds amazing, exactly what I wanted. Only thing I would change is the guitar strings for upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for someone for their birthday and the bridge and wood of the guitar is already cracked and broken even though it was very well taken care of so there’s no reason it should have only lasted one year of playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harnisch

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar with a great value
customer_reviews.text: Great starter guitar for my 16 year old, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hultman

customer_reviews.title: What you saw and read about is exactly what you received.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was exactly what I ordered. Shipment was in good shape guitar is nice looking and has a great sale. Purchase the product to learn how to play acoustic guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Hargett Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great learning guitar
customer_reviews.text: I have never played guitar before but i always wanted to learn. This bundle was perfect for me. A week into having received it I already know how to tune and play two beginner songs. This was a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Black beauty
customer_reviews.text: Love my new guitar. will be learning on how to play
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes with everything you need to get started. The free 3 month subscription to fender play is such a huge bonus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Axal12

customer_reviews.title: great guitar
customer_reviews.text: My son love it!! Its perfect for him and now he playing many songs.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Arcila

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made. Great place to start learning.
customer_reviews.author: Dr B

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice looking guitar even comes with 3 months free of guitar lessons. My tuner came in not working and the seller sent a new one no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from a quality and caring company.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guitar for my granddaughter for her birthday. She loves it. Very impressed with the quality and the fact that it came with carrying case, strap, tuner and extra strings. Austin Bazaar included a card to obtain information on how to play it on the internet, and also provided an email with detailed instructions in tuning it, which was a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Susieq

customer_reviews.title: There is an rusty on the string
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know is it just mine or it is everyone’s, the string came with rusty
customer_reviews.author: James Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for any level.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a professional performer and he loved it. Did a lot of research. Great price and product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: It should have fragile on the box so it won’t get damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I got it on the back of the body it looked s little bit lifted. but since I had waited so long to get it, even with prime, I wasn’t gonna make the risk of returning it and having to wait even longer to start practicing. However the guitar works fine and it’s a great guitar for beginners such as myself
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wont tune
customer_reviews.text: I cant get mine to tune using that POS little device. I ended up braking a string.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I love my new guitar!
customer_reviews.text: The guitar and the sound is beautiful. I am learning quickly to play and I am in heaven! :)
customer_reviews.author: S Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Honest sellers and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We needed to make an exchange and he worked great getting us what we needed . Fast nd kind service
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Fender guitar. Need I say more? For $200!? Cannot beat this deal. Another well built Fender product. Beautiful sound and tone.
customer_reviews.author: Imlucky666

customer_reviews.title: Guitar and package items exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Starter guitar for grandson; Fender was a good value choice over the Squire package. The vendor package protected the instrument, while the shipping packaging had an eight inch square hole torn in one corner; all the package items were still contained in the damaged carton.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Masao

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it for my son and he got it tuned up and started playing right away!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bracci

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. Hopefully it lives up to the name. Sorry, it's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: The guitar was a gift for a seasoned electric guitar player and he loves this fender starter kit. The fender sounds amazing. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for a package deal
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a gift, so I don't have an opinion or any knowledge as to whether or not it is a certain quality, but the value seemed great, the seller was great and shipping was prompt. No problems and came as described!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound! My son (16) made a great choice in buying this guitar for himself.
customer_reviews.author: oodall514

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice guitar. Check for picks though in the package. Mine didn’t come with any even though it was suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It stays in tune!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing about it. I have a Jay Jr. guitar and every time I picked up day after day I would have to re-tune it. I am really enjoying my guitar. Thanks for carrying a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Price

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter, who's just learning to play.....Good sounding guitar. Quality of materials and workmanship is consistent with the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: James Biscotto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier! Great sound. Great price. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: john floyd

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son in law, an experienced player in the past. He really enjoys it. Said the sound quality was above what he expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: I broke a string learning to tune strings. My fault entirely.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Learning to play a few minutes daily over You Tube. Set comes with a 3 month access pass to Fender play. I will use that when I'm a bit more proficient. Not as hard as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: If you buy the bundle you will have two cases and two straps.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying the bundle. The guitar by itself comes with a case and a strap. I now have two cases and two straps. The tuner is a plus but Fender has a app to help get you in tune.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Avers

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first guitar and love it. The package is nice but I find the gig bag useless. I’d invest in a hard case if you’re not going to keep it on a stand. The black finish definitely show smudges but I love the look of the sunburst.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Came from Austin Bazaar. It arrived in perfect condition and it has a great sound. I will definitely purchase from them again! I’m incredibly satisfied with my new acoustic and I can’t wait to relearn how to play!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Defective item carrying case replacement please
customer_reviews.text: Would like the carrying case replaced please it is defective from manufacture Please advise
customer_reviews.author: Pamela's Principal Axes

customer_reviews.title: Fender
customer_reviews.text: I am new to playing the guitar and i am in love this this acoustic, would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Devin A.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She is just beginning to play guitar. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cortenbach

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get started
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. She already plays other instruments and has been playing this every day. It has great sound for a beginner instrument, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: I have needed this guitar
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying/learning on an electric, Fender MelodyMaker. Having this gives a fresh approach "getting a grip" on my guitar
customer_reviews.author: DON ZEEK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old daughter and she loves it. Beautiful color and perfect size. Purchase and delivery was quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent guitar for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent guitar for beginners. Couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cz dirosario

customer_reviews.title: Who knew? Not new.
customer_reviews.text: It’s irksome that products get shipped as new, when there is visible evidence that the product packaging has been opened before and then taped up again.
customer_reviews.author: Pete49

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a lot for the purchase price.  Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The only complaint may be that my fingerprints show up easily on its shiney black surface but I'd still buy it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Bermes

customer_reviews.title: Quality Guitar
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast the delivery was. My girlfriend like it so much! The sound quality is astonishing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Janica R.

customer_reviews.title: The description is misleading on the product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a full size guitar, and it's a Yamaha not a Fender like it is advertised to be, and there is not stap in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, very happy with my first guitar!!
customer_reviews.text: The guitar was in perfect condition, and sounds amazing! Except that the tuner turned out to be faulty , rest everything was good, package also was delivered before the schedule !! So that was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Quality instrument for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the finish and workmanship is very good. To be expected in a Fender.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a toy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it looked too cheap the plastic looking wood. Also a grab bag was not inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie H Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and I can say its worth the money. All pieces came and were very well packaged. The guitar itself is very beautiful and sounds very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: No gig bag
customer_reviews.text: The guitar sounds and looks great. I did not receive the gig bag so would love to have that taken care of. Other than that it is a great guitar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Complete kit arrived on time and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard C Schur

customer_reviews.title: Good Guitar Bundle for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: It's a good guitar for beginners. Nothing was missing and the guitar came in great shape, no damage at all. It arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner guitar!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this guitar. He’s taking guitar for the first time in middle school and to the perfect guitar to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome guitar, great starter bundle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bundle, everything I need and lessons. This also came with basic information. For someone who has never picked up a guitar, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Serayna

customer_reviews.title: Great value for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great value for beginners. I bought two one for each of my sons. They both were delivered on time and in great condition. My boys love them and use them practically everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality for money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and good for beginners and intermediate. Slightly bigger for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kumaran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunburst guitar
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this guitar. It sounds beautiful and the color was absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fender FA-115 Dreadnought Acoustic Guitar - Black Bundle with Gig Bag, Tuner, Strings, Strap, and Picks
feature_bullets: Spruce top with "X"-bracing, basswood back and sides
